data.text: Rehoboam ne hana gi Shechem, di gowaa dela ne haga dagabuli ai nia daangada huogodoo o baahi ngeia o Israel belee hai a mee di nadau king.
Di madagoaa Jeroboam tama daane o Nebat, dela ne lele gi Egypt gi daha mo King Solomon, ne longono di longo deenei, mee ga hanimoi gi muli gi dono guongo.
Nia daangada o nia madawaawa o baahi ngeia o Israel gaa kae tegau gi mee, gei digaula huogodoo gaa hula i di gowaa e dahi gi Rehoboam ga helekai gi mee,
“Do damana gu hagauda mai gi gimaadou nia moomee daamaha. Maa goe gaa hai madau duadua gi maamaa, ga haga haingoohia madau mouli, gei gimaadou ga hai hegau manawa dahi adu gi di goe.”
Rehoboam ga helekai, “Dugua mai gi di au nia laangi e dolu e hagabaubau di mee deenei, gei goodou ga lloomoi laa.” Gei nia daangada gaa hula.

King Rehoboam gaa kae dono hagamaamaa mai baahi nia daane mmaadua ala nogo hai hegau gi dono damana go Solomon, ga heeu, “Ma di helekai bolo aha dela ga hagi mai go goodou bolo gi heia gi digau aanei?”
Digaula ga helekai, “Maa goe ga manawa dumaalia ga haga manawa lamalia digaula gi au helekai humalia, digaula ga hai hegau adu gi di goe i di manawa dahi gaa hana hua beelaa.”
Gei mee gu hagabalumee nia helekai o nia daane mmaadua, gaa hana gi baahi nia dama daane ala nogo tomo aga dalia ia, aalaa go ana gau hagamaamaa,
Gei mee ga heeu gi digaula, “Au gaa hai bolo aha gi digau ala e tangi mai gi di au bolo gi heia nadau moomee gi maamaa?”
Digaula ga helekai, “Deenei dau mee e hagi anga gi digaula: ‘Dogu madaalima dulii e koia e damana i tuaidina dogu damana!’

Hagi anga ina gi digaula, ‘Dogu damana gu haga uda nia mee daamaha gi godou nua, gei au gaa hai nia maa gi koia e daamaha. Mee gu haga mamaawa goodou gi di loahi hagamaawa dangada, gei au ga daaligi goodou gi di uga hagamaawa kau!’”
I muli nia laangi e dolu, gei Jeroboam mo digaula huogodoo guu hula labelaa gi di King Rehoboam, gii hai be dana helekai ne hai gi digaula.
Di king gu hagabalumee nia helekai a nia daane mmaadua, gei e helekai maaloo hagahuaidu gi nia daangada,

be nia helekai nia dama daane ala ne hai. Mee ga helekai, “Dogu damana gu haga uda nia mee daamaha gi godou nua, gei au gaa hai nia maa gi koia e daamaha. Mee gu haga mamaawa goodou gi di loahi hagamamaawa dangada, gei au ga daaligi goodou gi nia uga hagamamaawa kau!”

Ma go di hiihai a Dimaadua bolo gi haga gila aga ana helekai ala ne hagi anga go soukohp Ahijah o Shiloh gi Jeroboam tama daane Nebat.10.15 1 Kings 11.26-40 Deenei di mee a di king digi hagalongo gi nia daangada.

Di madagoaa nia daangada gu iloo ginaadou bolo di king hagalee hagalongo ang gi ginaadou, digaula gaa wwolo gi nua, “Daa gi daha ina David mo dono madahaanau! Di hagahumalia behee ne hai mai go digaula mai gi gidaadou? Nia daane o Israel, gidaadou gaa hula gi tadau gowaa! Rehoboam gi madamada humalia i deia!”10.16 2 Samuel 20.1
guu hai a Rehoboam gi hai hua di king ni digau ala e noho i tenua go Judah.

Gei King Rehoboam ga hagau a Adoniram, dela e dagi nia daangada ala e haga ngalua kono, gi baahi digau Israel, gei digaula ga dilidili a mee gii made. I muli di hai deenei ne hai, gei Rehoboam ga hagalimalima gaa gaga gi dono waga hongo henua, gaa lele hagammuni gi Jerusalem.
Daamada i di madagoaa deelaa gaa huli gi muli, nia daangada o di baahi ngeia o Israel le e hai baahi gi digau o di hale o David.
